content.detailedDescription:
190 description: looking at field across from the house on governors bridge rd where normal flight path is for bwi flights. it is a very clear night no cloud cover. we noticed a large craft flying low that changed directions and tilted to fly towards where we were standing in front of the yard on the other side of the road. we questioned why it was so bright and low. we also heard nothing that sounded like jets or planes. as the craft reached towards the road we noticed 3 distinct white lights on each corner and a flashing red light on top of the craft and the craft was approx. 5000 ft up which is not normal for planes that large to fly in this residential/rural area. it then flew over us silently tilted once again to make a faint turn and realized it was an isosceles triangle. it slowly flew past and above us down governors bridge rd towards route 50. it was so clear and unbelievable that we witnessed this craft. i ran inside quickly to get my phone to take pictures but it had flew off and didn't return.

date: 11/8/2011

time: 20:30

duration: 2 minutes

sighting city: davidsonville

sighting zip: 21035

sighting county: anne arundel

witnesses: 2

shape: triangle

number of craft: 1
content.distance: 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile
content.summary: Noticed unusually low flying craft bright white lights that changed direction and headed directly towards the house.No sound once near us by road, tilted and noticed triangular shape and flew slowly down road towards rt 50-white light on points/red ontop

content.detailedDescription:
Around 7-8 pm was turning onto my street facing south seen in the night sky between 25-35 degrees at least 2 miles .Away south of i-10.
 hovering 5 balls of white lights closely grouped together almost touching.Slanted from left to right, right side was higher. they looked hot. not like a  round light but more of a fire ball.There seemed to be white hot weldikng sparks dropping from the bottom of the lights on the left side.  i stayed in my vehicle and kept driving until my view was obscured . the sighting lasted 20 seconds. i have been around aircraft all of my life and in the military . this was not an civilian aircraft and like nothing ive seen in the military. i now look in the sky before i go outside at night. everytime.
content.summary: 5balls of white light  grouped closely  hovering with welding sparks falling off

content.detailedDescription:
On friday 10/15/2010; the unidentified flying/hovering thing hovered for 2 or 3 minutes and left a hole punch cloud. that`s what i saw about a year ago, but never reported it, because i simply did not know that i could. it was till two days ago when i saw an uap that i decided to investigated to who to report this. 
when i was getting into the sw fwy 59, from hwy 6 sugar land/first colony and then exit right away into w. university blvd. as i was driving i called my dad in ca at 6:24 pm, but at the almost of same time my gf called me and i her missed her phone-call at 6:25 pm. i finished talking to my dad at 6:27-6:28 pm. i looked up straight ahead and i saw a huge blimp or saturn-like thing that reflected the sun on its top just floating in the sky about more than a mile high infront of cumulus clouds, it was not a sundog or halo like. it was big, and not moving with wind, i stare at it the whole time, and i used to worked in lax airport for two years, and i know how manmade blimps look like, also i know how boeing commercial airplanes, airbuses look like before landing or taking off, this was nothing like them.
when i took off my eyes for a few seconds to exit the sw 59 fwy into w. university and i look up again, and i saw a hole punch cloud where the object was, and i could see something shining inside of the hole punch cloud, the weather was pleasant about 78 degrees. of course back then i did not know what a hole punch cloud was nor that below freezing temps are needed for that phenomena to happen. the sun was getting ready to set on the horizon and this object was way above the sun, nevertheless i could see the sun reflecting on it(top), even after it was gone(i did not see it taking off btw), i still could see the sun reflecting on something inside of the hole in the clouds.
there is an airport about a mile or two away from there but i did not seeing moving in any direction, it just disappeared. it was almost camouflaged with the sky but it was in front of the clouds, so i could see it. it was light blue.
content.summary: Unidentified hovering thing hovered for 2 minutes-left a hole punch cloud.

content.detailedDescription: It was very close when my friend spotted it. we noticed the object just as a single engine plane flew by at a low alt.I retreived binoculars from my truck while my freind and his mom wathched it. it slowly rose into the air i could see that on side had a yellow glow or aura and the other side was a blue aura it was rotating clockwise disc shaped but pointed triangular corners it rotated in the glowing basically looked like a small forcefeild or something until it disappeared into clouds 10,000ft ceiling it was unnerving to see something like that in broad daylight im glad i had witnesses, i hope someone else saw it as well i didnt fell threatened
content.summary: 5mn observation wbinoculars  slow rotating ascent until object went into cloud

content.detailedDescription: First sighting was in back of norad by colorado springs co.Saw a lot of aliens that looked like green man also saw aliens that that looked like cartoon characters.Also have a ton of pictures of all kind of aliens. i have over 8000 pictures of a lot of wield things. one set of pictures has this red dot in sky and an  alien follows the red dot the whole day i got about 2000 different pictures of this event happening during a weeks filming. i can show you an alien when you came and talk to me. i will bet my life on that. not too many other people can say that but i can.Have a video of an alien dancing on my car. it last about 5 minutes the whole thing is wild. haven't seen nothing like it on the internet. the red dot pictures shows an alien beaming down from the clouds. also have pictures where the aliens moved my camera 3 times in 2 minutes. got a pictures of the biggest bird i ever seen has to be at least 25 tall. i can also show you a video of, what i call a ladder that goes straight up it must be at least 3000 ft tall with nothing supporting it just goes up into the clouds. my partner has pictures just as good as mine.                                                        inclusion if you guys don't come and see me you made the biggest mistake of your life.Like i said i can guarantee that if you show up i will show you an alien.And you can take that to the bank.Hope to see you soon.I will only send one picture that should be more than enough. if you can blow it up you will be speechless.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.shape: Bullet,   Missile,   Disc,   Flash,   Sphere,   Triangle
content.summary: One projected imagine through wall see ships flying around all the time,also appear in lights

content.detailedDescription: I was working overnight at the bar in brooklyn. a friend was stopping in, as we were driving the next day to a wedding out of state. it was around 3:30am, and he was having a smoke and i was sitting on the front steps, looking out over the park. just then a massive green fireball streaked across the sky. i have seen lots of shooting stars before, they have always been quick zips across the sky that leave thin white streaks behind them. this was much much larger, with a much thicker tail. i would guess that if i hold my fingers out at arms length and measure across, the streak was roughly 5 inches long, and as i said, just wider across than a normal shooting star. and the trail in the atmosphere was distinctly green, sort of an emerald green glow. i tried to point it out to my friend, but by the time he craned around to look, the trail had faded. the next day i looked on gothamist and gawker and google, all in hopes of finding anyone reporting the same event, as when something happens in nyc, it's often seen by a lot of people. all i saw were a series of reports on green fireballs in the southwest states that same night.
content.summary: Green fireball across night sky

content.detailedDescription: After dinner one of the families that attend the mufon meeting invited everyone back to their place for sky watching. there was a total of 12 of us that went over to their house. we all had high expectations because almost all of the attendants had multiple previous sightings. funny enough,one of the organizers, had never had a sighting before that night. we had telescopes, night vision, cameras and google sky map ready for the evenings event. we setup in a field adjacent to the home around 7:30 pm.  we watched a lot of commercial traffic go by like 747 and at least 1 helicopter. we also saw at least half a dozen satellites go by. they are usually the tiny white specs that move across the sky in a straight line. around 9:30 pm, out of the blue, some says ���look there���! at about 90 degrees from our position heading east we saw what appeared to be a boomerang shaped object.  i would estimate it to be about 1 to 1.5 miles or 5,400 feet in the sky.  the size was about the same diameter of the moon.  this seem extremely large in comparison to many of the commercial airplanes we had seen earlier. we agreed it seemed to be about 3 to 4 times the size of a 747.  it had two orange lights, one on each end and a large center red light. we all noticed that it did not have the required red and green lights. we also notice that none of the lights were flashing. the red light seem very large. at that distance it looked like the diameter of the red light had to be about the same size of a small car. because we where all stunned we were silent and heard absolutely no noise. this was very different from all the other air traffic we had seen that evening. even the commercial airplanes that were much higher in the sky could be hear. below is an illustration of what we saw. the photo is a 30 second exposure of the exact location where we saw the object. i was using a nikon d50 with  a quantaray ld 70-300 telephoto lens.
content.summary: Ufo sighting after mufon nc meeting during sky watch

content.detailedDescription:
On november 6, 2011 in the city of maricopa around 5:34 pm, i was at my brother's house in his porch area located at his backyard sitting in a chair and conversing with my 2 brothers.  while we were talking to each other, one of my brother unexpectedly and expressively hollers out,  "there a white light in the sky!"... which at the same time he was pointing towards it in the direction where the object was traversing in the sky.  i quickly turned around to see the object that my brother was observing which was located in the sky between east and southeast in direction.  it was slowly traversing southeast at a high altitude like it was heading towards tucson. i quickly realized that it didn't appeared to be a plane nor jet flying.  so i rushed inside into my brother's house and grabbed my camera, then i quickly hurried back outside and rapidly started taking pictures of the object that was traversing.  after the third picture i took, i quickly previewed it via the camera.  it didn't look like a plane, jet, or balloon, so i continued taking more pictures of the object which was slowly traversing southeast.  the object appeared to be 1 to 2 miles away from our location, and it appeared to be at a standard altitude which commercial jet are normally seen.  the object appeared small in size; smaller than an aspirin if that was to be held away from me at arms length.  the object appeared to be an elongated, soft but pure white color object that was bright but not brilliant bright about the size a commercial jet fuselage for that distant superimposed horizontally in the sky.  the object didn't appeared to be constituted of light but rather just white in color like a cool white, elongated oval but slightly bulging, florescent lamp shape which also had a rough surface texture appearances and smoothly rounded like a cone at each end.  it was very slowly traversing across the sky going southeast slower than a typical commercial jet flying.  no navigation lights were seen such as strobe lights or green/red navigation lights.  the lighting remain constant which no flickering of lighting was observed, and no contrail were observed with the eyes including via the camera lens.  while observing the object and from my perspectives, it appeared to be making a wide sweeping coarse change while maintaining a general southeast heading.  there was clouds in the sky, and the object appeared to be traversing in-and-out of the clouds while traversing in a mono-direction and maintaining a horizontal flight.  the last sighting of the object was when it was near the horizon and inside a cloud bank formation at the far distant. the color of the object at its farthest distant appeared to be orange in color. when the white color was seen when it was nearest our location, it appeared to be (in my opinion) too bright white in color for the available lighting condition.

then at 6:03 pm while both of my brothers and i were still in the back porch area conversing with each other, again my brother abruptly yells out very excitedly, "there's a bright light that just instantly appeared in sky!"  so i quickly turned around and observed in the same general area of the first sighting a star-like object traversing an identical coarse of the first event sighting.  this object was at the same altitude, speed, and distant of the first event sighting but different in lighting: the lighting was not the same nor white in color but an arc-welding type color bathe in brilliant light;  and it also appeared from my perceptiveness also something similar to a contained miniature sparkler. the planet jupiter was seen to the left side in the sky, but the object was not brighter nor bigger than jupiter.  another planet, possibly venus, was seen near the area where the sun had set recently.  the object was not brighter nor bigger than venus.  my younger brother while he was observing the object only with his eyes made vocally a generalized comment while observing it that the object appeared to his perception to be zigzagging while it was traversing southeast in the sky.  as the object traversed southeast, the lighting  began to diminish with distant thereby making it extremely difficult to observe the object as it traverse further in the distant.  it also appeared to my perception to be orange in color when it was in a far distant yet that color was not seen when it was first observed closer to our location.  the object eventually was no longer seen when it traversed near the distant  horizon and into a cloud. 

no aircraft were seen during both of the sighting event.  however shortly thereafter the second sighting event, a helicopter and smaller types of  planes were observed flying around in the distant sky, and they were flying around like in a searching pattern in the same general area where both objects were seen traversing through earlier.  a total of three people observed the unidentified flying objects.  in the first sighting, there was plenty of twilight in the sky which distant things like clouds and houses were easily seen without any difficulties. the second sighting was much darker in twilight and distant things such as clouds and houses were still easily seen yet somewhat darken in lighting features due to the deficiency of available ambient lighting.  at both sighting event when first observed,  the object was located in the sky about 40 to 45 degrees off the horizon. last angle degree that both object were observed traversing was about 20 degrees off the horizon. there was no apparent wind blowing or observed during the sightings.  temperature outside was about 75 degrees f. no sound were heard during either event sightings. 
i took a few pictures of jupiter and venus, and those pictures shows them putting out extreme amounts of light.  in the 2nd event sighting which looked star-like, the lighting output captured on camera was not even close to being the same in lighting intensity of those planets yet the object looked star-like while it traversed.
content.summary: Two sequential sightings of identical flight coarse characteristics: 1st elongated oval shape white; 2nd event star-like.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on congress ave.@ i-95 heading south approximately at 9:30 p.M. march 30th 2010 when i noticed a green fireball from the east heading west slowly descending but never saw a landing. it only lasted a few seconds after disappearing over the tree tops. i thought it was the coolest thing ever and have always wanted to see a meteor.
content.summary: Looked like a small green meteor

content.detailedDescription: I was at home went outside around 12 am to smoke pulsating lights caught my attention i watched lights while i smoked the lights or object moved slightly to my left and back to original position,i was out about 5 mins.Had no idea what object was.Went back out 10 mins later object still there in same place,watched for about 8-1o more mins,object kept hovering in same spot,the lights on object kept changing colors from red,blue,orange,main color glowing white,about 12:30 am went back out object still there watched it this time for about 10 mins kept hovering and dropped down about 10 feet maybe and then back up to original position,went back inside looked out bathroom window still there.My feelings were oh my god i see another unknwon object.Went back k out around 1 am object still there doing same actions lights pulsating changing colors kept moving to left and back to original spot this time i watched it for about 15 -2o mins,never changed position kept doing same movements,never lost sight i finally went in around 1:30 am and laid down.I woke up my aunt around 12:30 am so she could see it her reaction was i don't know what it was.Don't know how long it stayed in area.But i know it was no airplane helicopter or any known flying machine i know of.
content.summary: It was stationary changing colors

content.detailedDescription: Several member of local mt community have witnessed 2 weeks of unusual lights along viking mt ridge area..2 photographers have taken over 100 photos of objects/lights/orbs after dark.. during the day up to 9  helicopters along ridge area in search patterns.. between 8:45 p.M. and up to sun up, all night long at times looks like a swarm of bees emmitting white to pink to green hovering then grouping lights, no sound.. one local resident of the upper mt area said the lights are very visable and look as though they are coming from within a mt cavity after dark..Resident also said they can be clearly seen as just a few hundred feel above her home and tend to gravitate to thw transmission towers..The face book group sky watchers have posted several night photos and one very visible day shot of the objects.The mt area has been the source of these lights for many years just not so many or so steady a period..Usually it's a few nights every few years ..This time 2 weeks of lights??
content.shape: Circle,   Oval,   Sphere,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: See face book easterntennessee ufo group or sky watchers pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
I just got out of the hotub on my deck.Im always looking up at night, i work nightshift and i am always looking up for satelites and i always 
hope one day ill see somthing i will undoubtably decare a ufo.
i happened, i dry off from the tub and go inside  for about 10 min. i come back out it a cool night and i light a smoke and  sit down on the step.
i look up and immediatley i see a v shaped line of very dim red amber lights
i would think about 7 circular  lights per side.
i t was about 1000 feet up and very large. to block  it from view i would have used about the basketball size object at arms length.
it came from direcly over my house and went on in a strait line  due east. abosolutley silent , it covered my sky line in about 7 seconds before it blended in the night sky.
my wife caught the tail end of it.When i say lights i dont mean it as we would see lights on a car 
they were very dim and could easily not be seen by anyone walking it just seemed to blend in with the night sky, yet 100% visible, i couldnt see any sides of it just the circular  amber red dim lights. it was alligned in a v shape rather than a boomer rang, it had about 7-9 lights per side wich formed a v that was more of a 60 degree angle.
it is my first sighting, i was really taken back, im the kind of guy where i could spin a great tale, but i tell you this was somthing  not of this world. dead silnt as it passed  over me and covered my sky line in 7 seconds.
i saw it  now im questioning what i should do,,, they are here and our goverments probably cant do a thing anyways, they have no need to contact us they can come and go as they wish,,,i am very puzzeled right now about what i should be doing,,, i seen it i believe it and i really feel like i should be trying to expose it to the rest of the world,,, where the hell was it going,,, i ask this because i drive somewhere ive got somthing to do
where were they going they obviously have somthing to do they arent just joy riding,,,, this bothers me the most i feel i have to do somthing about this and im inept to do anything except question what they are doing , we are a rich mineral deposited area, gawd i have a tonne of probable reasons 
but why  wont they make themselves known..... i always thought you peeps who report this stuff are wack jobs
mabey some of you are ,,,  but if u seen what i seen  i am certain you are going through what i am going through,,,,
content.summary: V shaped massive silent fast and not of this world 100% sure of that.

content.detailedDescription:
At 9:30 pm i went out side to have a cigarette. i saw red/yellow lights flying east toward me from the west, to the right of the san jacinto mountains, over highway 111. i assumed it was one of many helicopters that take the same flight path near my house. it looked like it was on fire, but traveled the same speed as any helicopter. it stopped, and it wasn't making any sound. i ran indoors to get my partner to see it. it was less than 10 seconds to get him outside, and it was gone. we both then noticed an unlit object, round, or balloon shaped passing overhead, and it crossed in front of the moon heading east in the direction of palm springs airport. it traveled in a straight line and seemed to be descending. in front of it's flight path, in the direction of the airport i saw a shooting star heading up, at a slight angle. not across the sky, or downward, almost straight up. my partner did not see the shooting star. we were both excited as we both have always wanted to see something like this in person. we discussed what to do, and i said i would make a report to mufon later, but first i called the local news kpsp. they had no other calls, and heard nothing on the police scanner.
 i went back outdoors and it was there again, but closer to the tram station on top of san jacinto which is to the left of it's first position. i ran inside and got my partner out again, this time he grabbed his iphone and started filming it. he told me to get the binoculars, which i did, and could see it looked now like a tiny speck of orange light, and then faded out. it was heading away toward the west. the lights at first were as bright as the light at the tram station, then slowly faded, as if moving away. it was hovering, and then moved west.
 3rd sighting at 9:35 pm. 
 this time i figured i'd go out front to the street to see if i could see it. it was back, and as bright as before, again i ran in to get my partner, and he saw it also. it seemed to be coming toward us heading east, but then stopped and went in the opposite direction. it didn't turn in a circle, it just went backwards, and faded out again. there was no noise or motor sounds at all. 
 i want to clarify it behaved like the many helicopters we see overhead, but made no sound at all. i am used to seeing lights from helicopters, and at the distance it seemed to be from me, we should have heard the rotors.  the shaded, unlit round object that passed in front of the moon, may have, or may not have been the same object.  during all of this, there were many passenger planes flying overhead as well. we are under, and between the east bound, and west bound air routes. of course those planes were much higher in the sky than the object was. 
 we stayed outside until 10:00pm to see if it returned, it did not.  the sky was clear, we could see all the stars, the moon is 3/4 full. the object blocked out the lower half of the moon when it passed overhead. there was no wind on the ground.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 sightings of same object in 5 minute span, 2nd sightign on video phone.

content.detailedDescription: I was testing out a ir night  vision camera with a real low lux .Oo1 and hi frame rate.  with all the lights out in the room we (a few of us seen this as it happens every time i show someone.)  these specks show up on the monitor that change direction at 90deg instantly and do other crazy moves. they move so fast at times it's amazing.   it's not dust in the air. this stuff can't be seen by the naked eye. only shows with the ir lights on.  what ever these are clearly are not influenced by air currents in the room.  i have no idea what i am seeing.  i know it is not electrical noise in the video signal. i am a electronics nut with over 40 years in the business.  i don't want to pretend to waste your time.  i have never tried to record these and i am sure that is what you want me to do and send it to you.  but i have not wasted my time doing it till.. as i am.. asking someone like you guy's if ya ever heard of anything like this??  then i'll take the time to try and record this. what ever i seen is sure weird and i got no idea what the hell it is.  these little bright specks zoom around like crazy.  and to give ya some idea.. say a 10' 10' view area in front of the camera.  there will be only 5 or so that i estimate. they move to fast to count and figure out any density.  but they are there.  i can't wait to hear back from you.  i know what i have seen.. i aint nuts...
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Microscopic things show in air on ir hi speed camera that zip around unike any dust could floating in air.

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were standing outside of our apartment and noticed two objects flying towards our location from over the tree line. the objects were glowing the color of a burning cigarette butt with a slightly off center red light. the two objects slowly flew overhead at about the speed of a helicopter. after moving overhead they began to ascend in an arc shape up into the sky until out of sight. the overall experience lasted about 2 1/2-4 minutes in a highly populated area.
content.summary: Two distinct objects giving off bright yellowish orange glow with a slightly off center red light

content.detailedDescription:
My son and i were heading home from work at around 12:10 am on tuesday november 8th, 2011.  as we were traveling on us hwy 42 west my son spotted the object in the sky at about a 45 degree angle from his seat in the vehicle. i then turned on old us hwy 42 and stopped my vehicle, rolled down the window to see if i could hear anything, which i did not.

from my vantage point, the ufo had a red outline in the shape of a "v", and i noticed a bright yellowish/orange glow from what appeared to be the bottom of the object. the glow almost looked like fire, but i did not see any sparks or trail, and it seemed to pulsate from yellow to an orangish color.

i continued down the road and turned into the condominium residence where i live.  my son pulled out his cell phone to take a picture but for whatever reason he could not focus on the object. we continued to observe the object traveling northwest until we couldn't observe it anymore.
content.summary: Red outlined

content.detailedDescription: Walked outside noticed strange flashing light on a slow to hover path watched it for about an hr had several witness one on the phone who saw the same thing it was a star like orb to the eye buy with a closer look it had white strobe lights around it with ted flashing lights one top and bottom with green in the middle .
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Multi colored orbs on a slow path with direction change

content.detailedDescription:
At 11:47 pm [tg], a straight light moved from one altocumulus cloud to another cloud near by, about a 1 mile high or 5 to 6,000 ft at 45 degrees from the horizon as a references point. it was a white and yellow string of solid light, moving in a straight line with impressive speed-not a lighting nor a shoooting star. it was not a shooting star, i have seen many of those, neither was a moondog(nor sundog- it happen at night), nor a halo nor anything analogous to atmospheric phenomena. 
it looked more like a firework, shooting high in the air, with the exception that i could see the beginning of it, and it was amazing, i was looking of the moon located at the southwest and talking in the phone to my best friend in nv, when i sudendly told him, you won`t believe what just happened here, the phone call ended abruptly w/o neither one of us hanging the phone, he redial me to made sure i was ok. i described to my friend to the best of my abilities. that thing began swerving [tg] without any light, like a wave of simmering steam emaning from a cloud, it was tranparent and then lit itself with a white and pale yellow light. and it stretch or extends from a point a to point b, like if someone was drawing it with a crayon made of light a thick line of light. it`s was surreal. it was quite late, so i can say that anyone else in the houston area saw it too, unless they had happened to be looking of the sky in the precise moment.
content.summary: Firework like-not a shooting star

content.detailedDescription: On november 7th at 1:00 i was driving home from a friends house in mineola ny and talking to my girlfriend on the cellphone. i came to a stop sign around the block from my friends house and notice two orange orbs very low in the sky. i said to my girlfriend, "wow something must of happen the police have the choppers out". then i observed that there was no sound and they were low and moving fast. i was like this is strange and i need to get someone else to witness this. i told my girlfriend i would call her back and she said ok. i proceeded to call my friend and told him to get outside because i think im seeing ufos. he ran outside and told me he doesnt see anything. i said maybe the tree lines are blocking the view  around the block . then he goes "i see them,two by my house". i said no their by me still. he said come here. so i rushed back and there they were. we watched them together for 5 minutes as they seemed to ascend then disappear. we were in disbelief i said "im going home this is weird." thats when 2 more ufos appeared in the sky my friend said im calling the police which he did. he told the dispatcher "hey you might think im crazy but im seeing  ufos in the sky . the dispatcher said "yeah and". my  friend responded "i just wanna know if im the only one. the dispatcher said no then yeah then said that another call had come in 4 blocks away from us. she ask for his name and what street we are on. then hung up on us. as soon as that happen we saw the 7th ufo flying low and looking like it was changing shape and moving fast then disappear over the tree line. 2 minutes later 2 police cars showed up and ask us what happen and said that they would look into it. basically thinking we were nuts. so after the police left we stayed outside seeing if it would happen again with no luck. im  a skeptic but this has no explanation. hopefully i get answers.
content.summary: Saw 7 object very bright flying a straight path no sound and the vanish

content.detailedDescription: I was taking pictures of the early morning skies,using my cell phone camera, when i notice an object almost in line with the sun. i thought maybe it was the moon, but i've never seen the sun and the moon line up in the same horizon. what is this? i don't really know.  it is not an airplane, because i watch the airplanes come and go from the airport and can see them clearly from my deck. this object was simply sitting there and suddnely it seem to back out or away and dissappeared instantly. gone.
content.summary: Silver metalic

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 0025 hours. (from lat / long moved to fi box) cms 11/07/11 17:57 cdt flg. on a bearing of approximately 143 degrees. azimuth from the ground approximately 35 degrees.

while outside and looking to the south east from my location i observed - what i thought at first - was a bright star. i am nothing of an astronomer baring the usual ''locating the big dipper'' or venus/mars/moon/jupiter, etc. 

when i did a double take on the object, it appeared to be a ''star'' which seemed to be low on the horizon, and was changing colors every second from red, to blue, to green, and back to red. the object was brighter than any of the other stars out last night.

i used they google sky map app (which i use from time to time), pointed it at the object and to my surprise there were no stars in that vecinity. i did take some video with my droid phone - but it's the classic ufo video - i say that due to the fact that there was a tree branch near my view and the video camera on the phone kept autofocusing on the object, then the tree branch, then the object. 

but even with the bad video, one can still see the object and the the (slightly blurred sometimes) change of colors. it was cold last night, clear, etc. the object never moved from it's location. i was at first curious - then thought it was just a plane, a helicopter, etc. but the more i looked at it - well, it just seemed real damn strange. 

i will be looking for it tonight to see if it's still there, or if it was some other heavenly object that i just mistook for something strange.

like previously mentioned - what caught my attention was that it was brighter than the average star that i am used to seeing at night, and upon closer scrutiny - it changed colors in a distinct pattern.

after viewing the object for approximately 15 minutes or so - i went to bed. i am not sure how long it was there for.

sorry that i did not do more to investigate / look at it through binoculars, etc.

hope someone else saw it - well, someone had to see it as it was between me and the city of atlanta - which is located approximately 45 miles south east of me.

good luck out there.

if the object is not back tonight, i may come back and upload the video.
content.summary: North west of atlanta, ga. stationary orb, bright, changing colors, unk altitude

content.detailedDescription:
I'm near sealy, texas, and the morning of thursday, october 27, 2011 at 5:25am my wife and i witnessed the star rigel, in the orion constellation, pulsating. (my wife had previously observed strange activity in orion the week before.) 

i leave every morning at 5:25 and she walks me to the truck. there are almost no street lights in my country subdivision and we have a good view of the stars, especially the westerly stars. since she had observed strange behavior previously, we were on the look-out. as soon as we walked out of the garage to go to my truck in the driveway, she said, "there it is!"

i said, "what? that very bright star?"

"yes"

about that time, it dimmed to "normal brightness" and then slowly pulsed back up to being very bright -- almost as bright as jupiter has been these last few weeks; but unlike jupiter it was a pure white light.

the dimming and re-brightening only took about two or three seconds. then it would remain bright for about ten seconds, and then pulse again.

we stood there and watched, never having seen anything like that (my first thought was "pulsar", but later research seems to rule this out). we watched it cycle through pulses about five times or so. then, on what turned out to be the last cycle, an orangish-red orb appeared about one "inch"  to the 9 o'clock position of the pulsing object (rigel?). it stayed visible for only two seconds. then, about five seconds later, the same object appeared about one "inch" to the 3 o'clock side of the star. again, about a two second visibility. when that orange globe vanished, the star made no more pulse cycles. the star was back to normal. it was rigel, no doubt, or, it was an object directly in front of rigel.

the orange globes had some volume. they were not a mere pin-prick of light, but similar to holding a baby aspirin out at arm's length (maybe just a wee bit smaller than that). 

there were no noises, no lateral movements, no smells, no barking dogs... all was tranquil.

at that point i waited around a bit longer and then had to leave so as to not miss my carpool. my wife hung around and did see a single bright flash above the belt of orion. (she had seen similar behavior on at least two other occasions in the previous week.) but other than that bright flash, nothing more was seen or has been seen since. i've gotten up most morning and looked. no luck.

btw, there were no clouds that night -- the stars were really bright. no moon in the sky either.

that's it. not the most sensational event, but the strangest i've ever seen -- especially the orange orbs. i've tried to be very factual and have not embellished. i hope this information is useful to someone. my wife and i will continue to be on the lookout.
content.summary: The star rigel, in the orion constellation; pulsating with two orange orbs appearing next to it.

content.detailedDescription: I was simply taking pictures in the early hours around 6:00 am. i had taken a whole series of camera shots with my cell phone camera, when i saw this object. the sun was already comming an can be seen in the frame. i waited to see if this was an airplane, but it was stationary and then simply started to back out of the picture and then suddenly dissapeared in an instant. it was not an airplane, because i can see and watch airplains from my deck go to an from the airport all the time and i've never seen the sun and the moon look like this at the same time in the same skyline.
content.summary: Silver or metalic in appearance and simply dissappeared, as though backing out and away in a straignt line and then it was just gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was smoking a cigarette on the balcony of my house watching the sky...When i saw a strange object upon my house big as the moon. the object remained stationary for about one minute before starting to move. so i took my camera and start make the video...
live color was bright silver, but on camera the color is white.
the object changed shape continuously, from edgy to smooth...Seemed liquid.
more witness saw the phenomena.
content.summary: live color was bright silver, changing shape continuously, from edgy to smooth. ...Almost "liquid"

content.detailedDescription: I want to know if anyone else had seen this object.  it was during bike week in daytona beach 1997.  my girlfriend, my friend and myself were traveling south on a1a, i believe around 11pm when i saw a glowing ball with a glittering tail out of my driver side window (i was the driver).  it was traveling slowly away from daytona beach out over the water east/northeast direction at a constant altitude.  i slowed down and told the others to take a look at it.  the object was moving away from us heading east/northeast.  it was brightly colored orange/white with an orange/red/green sparkling trail extending approximately 4-5 times the length of the object.  after approximately 5-10 seconds of moving slowly, it made an abrupt change in its flight angle moving more southeasterly in direction, but gained altitude at an incredible rate of speed.  it's velocity took it out of our visual range in only a few seconds.  when it changed direction and accelerated away, the tail color changed to a green/aqua color and it then moved out of sight.  we did not see it again on subsequent nights while we were there.
content.summary: Glowing ball with glittering trail, changed direction and ascended at great speed

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking pictures of planes making "xs" in the sky. most conspiracy theorists call these chemtrails. i was not expecting to catch anything. i just aimed at the "x" and lines and shot with my camera. i did not see anything with my naked eye.  

upon inspection of the pictures later reveled what looks like a white aspirin circle to the left of the sun with a red-ish hew around it.  if i were to take a guess, it is a ufo with some kind of force-field.  i also caught some pictures with what looks to be orbs in them, but i am not sure why they would be caught within the same minutes. 

it could be nothing, but i thought it was worth sharing.
content.summary: White circle shape with red dome (looked like a forcefield) to the left of the sun

content.detailedDescription: We were going to a party out in the country at a farm house.As we were driving i noticed a bright star moving ,i told my friend that star was getting brighter & moving.As we approached the farmhouse,we drove up the dirt road,then we noticed the light was decending fast down to the corn field.As we entered,the cornfields lit up like football stadium lights,was so bright we could not see what it was,no noise,or anything from it,as we ran towards it,it shot straight up to the sky,& was moving up in the stars.We never said anything about this to anyone.To this day,since 1978,we talk about it whenever we call each other.I currently live in florida,friend lives in wisconsin.
content.summary: This took place when i was in college with my friend

content.detailedDescription:
Facing north on plaza drive on eastside of evansville in vanderburgh county at about 8pm sunday nov. 6. my daughter and i saw the colorful lights in the sky. the object was about 100 feet in the air and as it got closer overhead you could see the dark saucer shape. the lights were multi-colored like something off a christmas tree and blinking in rotation underneath it.
the thing slowed to almost a stop just above us then slowly continued flying east. as it got further away, we kept watching it and it seemed to stop and hover again closer to newburgh, in.
the thing looked like a textbook ufo right out of a close encounters movie or something. 
we were dumbfounded at the sight of it. 
both of us were literally speechless with our jaw dropped as we watched it fly east toward newburgh proper. 
the thing looked like it was flying parallel between lincoln ave. and lloyd expressway. for a time it was about 200 feet up then lowered to  above the trees. we watched it until it seemed to disappear among trees going to newburgh.
afterward we were just amazed to see this thing. i am only reporting this because if someone else saw this thing without a witness, they might think they are going crazy or hallucinating but they are not, because we saw it too.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Classic saucer shape, dark in color with multi-colored lights, flashing in rotation.

content.detailedDescription:
while driving south along a country road at 2:14pm i noticed a white object floating in an easterly direction.  it appeared to be about 3/4 of a mile from me.  
  the object was all white with no features.  no windows, no wings or tail structure, no crew cabin beneath it like a blimp would have.  as a private pilot i am used to seeing all sorts of aircraft including helicopters since sykorsky builds them nearby.  it looked kind of like a white mushroom cap.
  i took a side street to get closer and it went behind a line of trees then floated back into sight for a few more seconds before it went behind some more trees and i lost it for good.  
  i was going to call the local police to ask if anyone else had seen it but decided not to.  i didn't want to bother them.  i'd like to see this object again and maybe video record it.
content.summary: White disk-like object observed heading  easterly in broad daylight.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on hwy 291 out of lee's summit on halloween night. i saw a group of green and white lights flying above tree line towards me. i first thought it was a fly over for the chiefs game and then saw the size of it as it approached closer. it was not a group of planes, because i can recognize the distinct shape of f16's and bombers and it moved too fast to be a blimp. once i saw the size, i immediatley puleed over and started to try to put a new cf card into my camera. at this point, it had stopped and was hovering for about 20-25 seconds with no sound at all. it then took off in the other direction and this is when i could positively indentify it as one moving disc like object. the lights were blinking white and green. i did not get a pic because i did't want to take my eye off of it and my mind was furiously trying to logically explain what i was seeing. i got back in my car and was heading west back into kc on i-435 and saw it move across the sky again, but was too far away to get a pic. i was curious and typed it into google when i got home and saw all the reports for the month of october. i wish i could have had my camera ready in time!
content.summary: Gigantic disc like object flew low over skyline with pulsating lights. hovered for about 20-25 seconds then left in opposite direction. no sound noticed.
